title: Random freeze for 1 sec
body:
For the past few weeks, my game started to randomly freeze(once or twice per game) for very short period of time, then back to normal. My FPS doesn't drop, and my ping doesn't spike.
I tried to:
repairing the game
lowering graphic settings
capping fps at 144
updating graphic drivers
Closing all the background apps

This just started happening couple weeks back, was fine before that. Please help.

replies.body: It sounds like you've definitely narrowed down the cause of this issue a good deal already, that may have something to do with something going wrong in your config files possibly. Let's log into the client, then goto your installation folder and delete the entire Config folder. After that, launch a custom game to verify the reset saved, and let me know if you see those games stutter anymore.
